feed.title: St. Peters Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 04:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets or freezing rain late in the morning then to rain showers in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
